definition: classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: Are there draughts around windows and doors?
sentences.chinese: 在窗戶和門附近有通風口嗎？

sentences.english: Be sure to install an outlet at the back of the cabinet.
sentences.chinese: 記着在櫃子的後面安裝一個通風口。

sentences.english: In the hot aisles are vents to pull that hot air out through the ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 在炎熱的過道是通風口，以渡過上限，熱空氣排出。

sentences.english: Ventilation opening should be special enough in Enclosed lamp house .
sentences.chinese: 封閉的燈箱安裝，應有足以散熱的通風口。

sentences.english: Apparently the 'ventilation' holes in the cases are big enough to allow fruit flies access to the inside.
sentences.chinese: 盒子的通風口原來大到可以讓蒼蠅飛進來嗎。

sentences.english: There is also a new front grille , as well as color-coded side vents.
sentences.chinese: 還有一個新的前格柵，以及顏色編碼的側通風口。

sentences.english: Additional vents or an automatic vent fan may be required.
sentences.chinese: 可能需要設置額外的通風口或者安裝自動排風扇。

sentences.english: The distinctive saw-tooth form is designed to accommodate windows and smoke vents, among other things.
sentences.chinese: 獨特的鋸齒狀的形式是爲了適應窗戶和通風口等等。

sentences.english: Install air vent at door window if necessary.
sentences.chinese: 必要時在車窗處安裝通風口。

sentences.english: Let its ashes float away on the wind or up the vent.
sentences.chinese: 讓它的灰燼飄散在通風口的風中。

sentences.english: All openings of the sewage pumping station shall be installed with acoustic louvers .
sentences.chinese: 污水泵房的所有通風口，必須安裝隔音百葉簾。

sentences.english: The side vent cowls are tailored to the needs and speeds of the street.
sentences.chinese: 側面通風口而定製，這些需要和街道的速度煙囪罩。

sentences.english: Contrast-stitching detail with medial-side air vent holes.
sentences.chinese: 對比拼接細節內側側空氣通風口。

sentences.english: The vent in the roof, when there is a wind, also lets in the rain.
sentences.chinese: 屋頂的通風口只要風大一點的話就會有雨飄進來。

definition: (jocularly) public building that has been lying idle (and is thus ideal for housing mosquitos) (Tw)
